amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Defense to conduct strategic assessments of the use of violent or unorthodox Islamic religious doctrine to support extremist or terrorist messaging and justification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 115-217 to require the Secretary of Defense to conduct strategic assessments of the use of violent or unorthodox Islamic religious doctrine to support extremist or terrorist messaging and justification.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 217 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 217 (Roll no. 372).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Franks (AZ).
